name: hm05
effect: Teaches Defog to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.
flavor_text.emerald: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A blast of light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It also illuminates caves.
